title: Inside Europe 13.10.2022
description: NATO members ask if boosting Ukraine's air defense threatens their own security, a digital summit in Estonia lauds “trusted connectivity” amid growing cyber threats, housing asylum seekers on cruise ships in the Netherlands stirs anger, and religious education in Poland loses its appeal. Also; our environment podcast On the Green Fence asks if co-housing groups offer a low-impact way of living.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Ukraine war, NATO defense, security in Europe, low impact housing, co-op housing, religious education, Poland, asylum seekers, Netherlands, cruise ships, digital summit Estonia
